Reviews.Title: Its not a New Phone..Hangs every now and then
Reviews.Author: Dj
Reviews.Content: Firstly packing tell you that this is not an original Moto. Secondly I ordered a black phone and got a different color one. I put the sim and try to play a game and it got hanged. It again hanged after restart when tried to set picture Resolution. Also a button on the right is loose. It shows Indian Networks in the list of Network.Phone works but the complete feel of it is not original.I would not recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: me duro solo 1 mes
Reviews.Author: Eli Saul Romero M
Reviews.Content: no me salio bueno este cel....! -.-, se colgaba muchisimo  y luego al poco tiempo se apago y mas nunca encendio..!
